entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 3:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: SW 20 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of snow beginning late in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
